## Introduction
Estimate the cell cycle phase that the cells are in using marker genes. 

```{r}
ctrl <- readRDS(here("output", "ctrlKO_seurat_integrated_annotated_high_res.rds"))

# Seurat comes with marker genes for the cell cycles in humans. we map them to drosophila
s_genes <- gorth(
    query = cc.genes.updated.2019$s.genes,
    source_organism = "hsapiens",
    target_organism = "dmelanogaster"
) %>%
    pull(ortholog_name)

g2m_genes <- gorth(
    query = cc.genes.updated.2019$g2m.genes,
    source_organism = "hsapiens",
    target_organism = "dmelanogaster"
) %>%
    pull(ortholog_name)



# run the scoring separately for the replicates:
ctrl_split <- SplitObject(ctrl, split.by = "orig.ident")

ctrl_split <- lapply(setNames(names(ctrl_split), names(ctrl_split)), function(x) {
    print(x)
    tmp <- ctrl_split[[x]]
    tmp <- CellCycleScoring(tmp,
        g2m.features = g2m_genes,
        s.features = s_genes
    )
    return(tmp)
})

# make sure that the cell IDs are the same when transfering the metadata
stopifnot(all(Cells(ctrl) == lapply(ctrl_split, function(x) Cells(x)) %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()))

ctrl$S.Score <- lapply(ctrl_split, function(x) x$S.Score) %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()
ctrl$G2M.Score <- lapply(ctrl_split, function(x) x$G2M.Score) %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()
ctrl$Phase <- lapply(ctrl_split, function(x) x$Phase) %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()
saveRDS(ctrl, here("output", "ctrlKO_seurat_integrated_annotated_high_res_cellcycle.rds"))
```

# Visualize scoring
```{r}
# check the distribution of phases per celltype
phase_distribution <- ctrl@meta.data %>%
    group_by(Phase, celltype_manual) %>%
    tally() %>%
    left_join(., table(ctrl$celltype_manual) %>%
        enframe(name = "celltype_manual", value = "n_total")) %>%
    mutate(fraction = n / n_total) %>%
    mutate(Phase = factor(Phase, levels = c("G1", "S", "G2M"))) %>%
    dplyr::filter(celltype_manual != "unk") %>%
    mutate(celltype_manual = factor(celltype_manual, levels = c(
        "aEC", "pEC", "Copper", "mEC", "MT", "EE",
        "daEC", "dEC", "EB", "ISC"
    )))

ggplot(phase_distribution, aes(x = Phase, y = fraction, fill = Phase)) +
    geom_col() +
    facet_wrap(~celltype_manual) +
    chameleon::scale_fill_chameleon()+
    theme_Publication() %+%
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    ylab("Fraction of cells")

```
